text:
[Verse]
Night sky shining bright
Stars are out tonight
Feel the groove take flight
In the moonlight

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the sand
Holding your hand
Music from a band
Life feels so grand

[Chorus]
Let's dance until the dawn
Move until the night is gone
Moonlight keeps us swayin'
Hearts keep on playin'

[Verse 3]
Waves crash on the shore
Wantin' so much more
Dancin' till we're sore
Can't ignore

[Bridge]
Spin around
Feel the charm
Wrapped within your arms
Safe and free from harm
Under star alarms

[Chorus]
Let's dance until the dawn
Move until the night is gone
Moonlight keeps us swayin'
Hearts keep on playin'
title: Moonlight Dance
